name: Evive Station
overview: Evive Station is a first-of-its-kind kiosk that cleans & sanitizes resuable bottles, and fills them with 0.2-micron filtered water. The free double-wall, stainless steel smart bottle has been designed to incorporate a passive RFID tag - in order for a user to receive a free bottle, they ask them to fill out a short demographic profile. When the user approaches the Station, they scan their bottle and enter a 4-digit pin. Once accepted, the user inserts their bottle and cap. During the cleaning and filling process, they target job and internship opportunities, advertisements, and campus messaging to that person on their 32” 1080P high-definition screen. The one-minute process will result in a cleaned and filled bottle.
